title: Should America Be Run by … Trader Joe’s? (Rebroadcast)
description: The quirky little grocery chain with California roots and German ownership has a lot to teach all of us about choice architecture, efficiency, frugality, collaboration, and team spirit.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The quirky little grocery chain with California roots and German ownership has a lot to teach all of us about choice architecture, efficiency, frugality, collaboration, and team spirit.
